response.overview: A public information film about marine safety equipment could cover a range of topics, including life jackets, flares, radios, and emergency procedures. It would likely be aimed at recreational boaters, emphasizing the importance of carrying and knowing how to use safety equipment, as well as understanding potential hazards in the marine environment. Films from the British Film Institute (BFI) and the UK's Central Office of Information (COI) have produced various public information films covering a range of safety topics, including those related to water and boating.
response.title: Marine Safety Equipment
